example_en: The leaves fell from the tree.
He went to the store yesterday.
She hung the picture on the wall.
The child hid behind the tree.
She laid the book on the table.
He led the team to victory.
The cat lay in the sun.
I met her at the station.
He rode his bike to school.
example_ru: Он поехал в школу на велосипеде.

example_en: She ran to catch the bus.
He shot the arrow at the target.
The ship sank in the storm.
We spent the day at the beach.
The key stuck in the lock.
He threw the ball to me.
